title: Not Sure if I have been banned, or if this is a regular thing that happens
body:
So i was in a match a few minutes ago, and them my computer went and blue screened of death, twice, in that match, the first time, i reconnected no problem! but the second time i got that screen you see above, and now i dunno if i have been banned or penalized because of this. if anyone has ANY ideas on ANYTHING i can do to help! please let me know! this is the ONLY game my computer does this with consistently. 

-A distressed Jungler

replies.body:
Rest easy, this definitely looks like a technical issue and not a ban.  There might be some serious hardware issues if you're getting a blue screen, so I don't recommend queueing up for games for now.  This specific error can also indicate security settings preventing a proper update/install. 

Download our [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) if possible to collect some logs, and attach them to a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new).  Our tech team can look into this with you and help find some solutions.
thank the stars. What sort of ticket should i create?
i mean obviously technical issues, but what information should i put in the ticket?
You are not penalized, go play and have fun

How can you tell? Is there something that just happened to the servers? is there something that happened that i didn't know about? What did i do to trigger this?

also it does not seem to want to update
